footer.description: Kylith is a next-generation keyboard brand that combines style and performance.

hero.title: Where performance meets style.
hero.subtitle: Kylith is a next-generation keyboard brand that combines style and performance.

reviewsList.author: John Doe
reviewsList.title: Great Keyboard for Work and Play
reviewsList.content: I've been using this keyboard for both work and gaming, and it's been a great experience. The typing feels natural, and the responsiveness is excellent. The RGB lighting is also a nice touch.

featuresList.title: Comfortable Typing
featuresList.description: A balanced typing feel with firm resistance and quiet operation.

featuresList.title: Style and Functionality
featuresList.description: The cold aluminum and matte PBT keycaps add a touch of elegance and comfort.

featuresList.title: All Devices Compatible
featuresList.description: Compatible with all devices, including Mac, Windows, Linux, and iOS.

featuresList.title: 5-Year Warranty
featuresList.description: We provide peace of mind for long-term use with a 5-year warranty.

newsletter.title: Get the perfect Kylith, just for you.
newsletter.subtitle: We'll send you the latest news and updates. You can unsubscribe anytime. Please see our Privacy Policy for more information.
